A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This had all the problems I forgave 'Force Awakens' for in the name of re-setting the franchise (predictability\, unanswered questions\, cliches\, superficial original trilogy callbacks with no developed purpose) PLUS moments of prequel-like slapstick\, abandonment of the rules of the Force\, and significant scenes that were clearly meant to mimic the beats of a Marvel movie. This film leaves open the Force Awakens plot holes I expected it to fix\, and threw in huge ones of its own. There are scenes that are absolutely right and awesome\, but you get there through cringe-inducing dialogue\, baffling decisions\, and lots of deus ex machina.
